Single coin of your choice Select the metal (copper, silver, electrum, gold, platinum) and multiplier (unit, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000) to create your custom coin. Contents: 1 customizable metal coin Metal choice: copper, silver, electrum, gold, platinum Multiplier choice: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 Finish according to chosen multiplier Perfect for completing a collection or replacing a lost coin.
